name: Notion Cover Images #2
description: 13 designs in the Notion colours for Light and Dark mode.The cover images in this pack are based on Notion's text, select and background shades. You can use them to you get a consistent look and feel across your Notion workspace. For each colour you get a plain cover image and a set of 10 headline covers including (Planner, Invoices, Home, Dashboards, Journal, University, Habit Tracker, To-Do, Calendar, Finances)Here's a link to a table of all the notion colours if you fancy making your own cove
